analysis.description:
QiibeePresale.token (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#455-456) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.token (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#35)

QiibeePresale.isFinalized (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#475-476) shadows:
	- FinalizableCrowdsale.isFinalized (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#195-197)

QiibeePresale.lastCallTime (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#468-470) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- validPurchase (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#631-644)

Reentrancy in QiibeePresale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#520-552):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(QiibeeTokenInterface(token).mintVestedTokens(beneficiary,tokens,from,cliff,vesting,revokable,burnsOnRevoke,wallet)) (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#545-546)
	- require(bool)(QiibeeTokenInterface(token).mint(beneficiary,tokens)) (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#547-549)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- balances (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#549-550)

Reentrancy in QiibeePresale.distributeTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#566-590):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(QiibeeTokenInterface(token).mintVestedTokens(_beneficiary,_tokens,from,cliff,vesting,_revokable,_burnsOnRevoke,wallet)) (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#583-586)
	- assert(bool)(QiibeeTokenInterface(token).mint(_beneficiary,_tokens)) (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#587-588)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokensDistributed (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#590)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#85-103) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/9/0xee97c0e0bcb326065432db2c2230fab369a0a1b0.sol#97-102)
